page.title: 15East Calder Gala Day
page.content:
The Gala Day is usually held on the 2nd week of June every year.It was first started by the local Shale Miners about 20 years ago.There are 13 men in the Gala committee.The money is raised from the Gala programmes(25p) and local shops also give donations.{ { {Here are some events during Gala Week.
SUNDAY:Gala Concert in E/C School.
THURSDAY:Fancy Dress Competitions.
SATURDAY 12.45pm:Best Decorated Umbrella. 1.00pm:The Races Begin.
Flat Race,Sack Race and Skipping Race are run.Trophies and medals are to be won.At night there are shows and entertainments to go to.
